post.author: oliver
post.title: Application development with Orchard
post.content:
A while ago, we decided to build discoverize – our generic portal software inspired by www.camping.info – using Orchard, “a free, open source, community-focused project aimed at delivering applications and reusable components on the ASP.NET platform.”

We will write about our experience with Orchard development using this post as a starting point and reference for all posts concerning Orchard.

Module development

  1. Data Access in Orchard Module development
  2. …

 

To be continued.

Oliver
